description: Creates an IoT policy. The created policy is the default version for the policy. This operation creates a policy version with a version identifier of 1 and sets 1 as the policy's default version. Requires permission to access the CreatePolicy action.

parameters.name: policyDocument
parameters.description: The JSON document that describes the policy. policyDocument must have a minimum length of 1, with a maximum length of 2048, excluding whitespace.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Metadata which can be used to manage the policy. (dict) --- A set of key/value pairs that are used to manage the resource. The tag's key. Value (string) --- The tag's value.

nested_items.name: policyDocument
nested_items.description: The JSON document that describes the policy.
